help.command-create-description: Create an alert with the message for the specified responders.
help.command-note-description: Add [note] to the alerts with IDs [tinyID tinyID2..].

help.command-ack-description: Acknowledge the alerts with IDs [tinyID tinyID2..].
help.command-unack-description: UnAcknowledge the alerts with IDs [tinyID tinyID2..]
help.command-assign-description: Assign alerts with IDs [tinyID tinyID2..] to [user].
help.command-close-description: Close the alerts, incidents, mass notifications with IDs [tinyID tinyID2..].
help.command-own-description: Take ownership of the alerts with IDs [tinyID tinyID2..].
help.command-priority-description: Update priority of the alert with [tinyID].
